import React, {Component} from 'react'; import logo from './content/img/logoxirka.png'; import {Link,withRouter} from 'react-router-dom'; class SideBar extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { statistik: false, logpintu: false, pengguna: false, ruangan: false, ruanganuser: false, device: false, }; } showStatistik(){ this.setState({statistik:true}) this.setState({logpintu:false}) this.setState({pengguna:false}) this.setState({ruangan:false}) this.setState({ruanganuser:false}) this.setState({device:false}) } render(){ return (

ADMIN

  • Ruangan

) } } export default withRouter(SideBar);
